[STRUCTURE]: Abrupt transitions between descriptive scenes and historical/political context (e.g., jumps from Grasse to Parisian scandals).
[CLARITY]: Some unclear connections between artistic themes and biographical/historical details.
[TRANSITION]: Lack of smooth links between paragraphs (e.g., shift from Pompadour’s influence to the boy’s clerical apprenticeship).

[LEXICON]: Occasional overly verbose phrasing (e.g., "living and breathing the beauty of the pleasant land of romance that bred him").
